alert.note: Alert for Western Chippewa (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 1:13AM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Chippewa County through 200 AM EDT... At 112 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Paradise, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Bayview Campground around 125 AM EDT. Raco around 130 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Bay Mills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.
